author: J. R. Esquinas
title: ROMER√çA VIRGEN DEL ROC√çO | Devoci√≥n con la Virgen del Roc√≠o en el Pantano de Elche
text: Honores a la Blanca Paloma en el Pantano de Elche La Virgen del Roc√≠o est√° custodiada en el paraje natural entre romeros y esta madrugada se dar√° uno de los momentos m√°s especiales con el salto de la reja ¬°Viva la Blanca Paloma! ¬°Viva! Son los v√≠tores que m√°s se escucharon este viernes con una romer√≠a hist√≥rica que desde la parroquia del Coraz√≥n de Jes√∫s hasta el Pantanto de [Elche](https://www.informacion.es/elche/) aflor√≥ el fervor de los devotos a la Virgen del Roc√≠o. La imagen ha pasado su primera noche en la explanada del paraje natural y est√° previsto que en la madrugada del domingo se suceda el tradicional acto del salto de la reja y la procesi√≥n a partir de la 01:00 horas. Ser√° ya este domingo a partir de las 17 horas cuando la Virgen regrese al templo sagrado pero antes son muchas las muestras de cari√±o en forma de baile y cante hacia la Reina de las Marismas que este a√±o, y como ocurre cada siete a√±os viste con atuendos t√≠picos de una pastora. Este s√°bado, por ejemplo, y antes de la lluvia de primera hora tuvo lugar el Rosario de la Aurora, a las 6 horas, y ha tenido lugar un paseo de caballos por el recinto entre las diferentes carpas donde se ve√≠an vecinas ataviadas con sus mejores trajes de rociera al son de m√∫sica flamenca. La ciudad lleva acogiendo esta romer√≠a organizada por la Comunidad Andaluza de Elche m√°s de tres d√©cadas, en concreto es la edici√≥n n√∫mero 33 y los actos conmemorativos arrancaron el 25 de mayo con el preg√≥n a cargo de Jonatan Sandoval Alarc√≥n, pitero de la Romer√≠a desde hace 35 a√±os. El 27, 28 y 29 de mayo se realiz√≥ un triduo a la Virgen en la misma parroquia. Misa rociera Ya este viernes se presentaron los simpecados, la liturgia y se bendijo a todos los peregrinos a partir desde las 16 horas, media hora antes de que partiese el cortejo. A la llegada al pantano, se cant√≥ la salve Rociera, uno de los momentos m√°s emocionantes. Est√° previsto que esta tarde, a las 20:00 horas, se realice la misa rociera cantada por el coro Gramaseca, a las 21:00 horas se har√° un homenaje con el grupo Ecos de Andaluc√≠a y finalizar√° con la actuaci√≥n en directo del Grupo Candela a partir de las 22.30 horas. Este a√±o el cuadro que ilustra la agenda de actos, est√° realizado por Mar√≠a Jes√∫s Costa, socia de la Casa de Andaluc√≠a de Elche, donde ha querido homenajear a la figura del rociero ilicitano con figuras representativas de la ciudad con la t√©cnica de acuarela. author: Joanna Sanchez
title: Families From All Over The World Gathered Together For The 2024 Family Weekend Event
text: On Feb. 16 and 17, John Brown University organized its annual Family Weekend event, offering the student body of JBU the perfect opportunity to invite their families and friends to enjoy various activities during the weekend. From Texas to El Salvador, the University campus served as the host to a large number of families from diverse places. Some of the activities offered by JBU and leadership groups included a special chapel service to hear from President Dr. Charles Pollard, a basketball game and the cherry on the cake, a night full of competition and talent. On Friday morning, families gathered at the Cathedral of the Ozarks to receive a warm welcome from Chip Pollard. This welcoming also served as an extra chapel credit for those students who attended. The atmosphere was brimming with devotion as everyone was praising the Lord in one voice. Additionally, the families who joined the chapel service experienced the once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to witness President Pollard‚Äôs dancing skills, provoking laughs and enjoyment among them. The President of The Student Government Association, Gustavo Maida, shared his parents‚Äô thoughts about this gathering: ‚ÄúMy parents are truly impressed by the way that the President engages with the students and the way that students treat him.‚Äù After the chapel service concluded, parents had the opportunity to witness their children‚Äôs classes, which allowed them to experience a bit of their children‚Äôs daily college routine. Maida, whose parents originate from El Salvador and traveled from there, shared: ‚ÄúThey were really impressed since universities in El Salvador do not offer these kinds of opportunities.‚Äù Freshman Elementary Education major, Ainsley Bean, said: ‚ÄúMy parents liked the experience, I also brought my siblings.‚Äù Besides, she shared with us the abrupt change in the JBU cafeteria‚Äôs menu: ‚ÄúI did notice that the food was really good on Friday‚Äù. Additionally, Freshman Art and Illustration major, Grace Stromberg, included: ‚ÄúMy parents came from Dallas, Texas. I did not invite them to any of my classes, but I know they enjoyed the student‚Äôs gallery a lot, just being able to see all the student‚Äôs art.‚Äù Opinions might differ, but the vast majority of them agree that parents had a pleasant time on campus, including their experience at the cafeteria. On Saturday afternoon, families had the chance to cheer on the JBU‚Äôs Basketball Team as they played against Texas Wesleyan University‚Äôs team, the ‚ÄúRAMS‚Äù. The game was a great opportunity for the families to spend quality time together as it was full of emotions. The game ended up with a victory for the JBU‚Äôs team. Indeed, Saturday was a busy day as it was full of activities. From 7 p.m. to 8:30 p.m., John Brown University‚Äôs Student Events and Activities hosted the 2024 Talent Show event. This was a great opportunity for JBU students to share what makes them unique. It was, without a doubt, a magical night where students sang, danced and even played instruments. Junior international business and entrepreneurship, Lila Lemus, shared her experience being on stage: ‚ÄúIt was an experience that my heart needed. Being able to perform again after many years was a huge blessing. I am so grateful for being able to share a part of my life and my talent with the people that I care for.‚Äù Lemus also expressed her amazement as she looked out from the stage and saw the Cathedral filled with families. Stromberg also shared her family‚Äôs experience at the talent show: ‚ÄúWe did go to the talent show and they all really enjoyed it! They had a lot of fun seeing the different acts and just seeing everyone‚Äôs talent.‚Äù Right after the Talent Show came to an end, an ‚Äúafter party‚Äù was waiting for the families and the participants at Walker Student Center. There were snacks of all kinds such as nachos, pretzels, popcorn, gummies and sodas for everyone to enjoy. Undoubtedly, there was no better way to conclude such a night than with a booster of sugar! Family Weekend 2024 was, once again, an absolute success, as families gathered to share JBU‚Äôs values and practices. Photo courtesy of John Brown University Communications

author: Bihter Sevinc
title: Nikki Sixx Shares Sad News On M√∂tley Cr√ºe‚Äôs Tour Plans
text:
Nikki Sixx Shares Sad News On M√∂tley Cr√ºe‚Äôs Tour Plans
In a new tweet on his official X account, Nikki Sixx revealed a sad update on M√∂tley Cr√ºe‚Äôs tour schedule.
‚ÄúHow are you doing?‚Äù a fan asked the bassist in a Q&A session. Sixx replied, ‚ÄúThank you for asking. Me and Courtney [Sixx] are really busy between all our business‚Äôs and our daughter. Nice to be off the road til next year.‚Äù
M√∂tley Cr√ºe announced in September that they would perform shows at The Roxy, Troubadour, and Whisky A Go Go in Los Angeles. The band had three exclusive, intimate club shows at Hollywood‚Äôs Sunset Strip on October 7, October 9, and October 11.
The three club shows happened after the release of M√∂tley Cr√ºe‚Äôs ‚ÄòCancelled‚Äô EP on October 4. The EP, their first with Big Machine, has three new songs: ‚ÄòDogs Of War,‚Äô ‚ÄòFight For Your Right,‚Äô a cover of the Beastie Boys‚Äô song, and the title track ‚ÄòCancelled.‚Äô
The band made [a surprise appearance](https://rockcelebrities.net/motley-crue-gets-dumped-back-out-in-a-trash-truck-at-first-night-of-hollywood-takeover/) at the Troubadour on October 8 for their Hollywood Takeover. They shared a video on social media of a trash truck pulling up to the venue and unloading trash, only for the band members to jump out.
They captioned the clip, ‚ÄúM√∂tley Cr√ºe gets dumped back out in a trash truck on the Sunset Strip in Hollywood for night 1 of the H√ñLLYWOOD TAKE√ñVER!‚Äù
M√∂tley Cr√ºe also reminded fans about a charity auction with instruments used on stage, each signed by the band. The money raised went to Covenant House International.
Though the Hollywood Takeover was meant to go back to basics, M√∂tley Cr√ºe still played their usual hit songs at the Troubadour. The 16-song set included classics like ‚ÄòPrimal Scream,‚Äô ‚ÄòShout at the Devil,‚Äô and ‚ÄòKickstart My Heart,‚Äô along with newer songs like ‚ÄòDogs of War‚Äô and a cover of the Beastie Boys‚Äô ‚ÄòFight For Your Right.‚Äô
M√∂tley Cr√ºe‚Äôs deal with Big Machine brings them back together after working on the 2014 album ‚ÄòNashville Outlaws: A Tribute To M√∂tley Cr√ºe.‚Äô Big Machine also worked with M√∂tley Cr√ºe‚Äôs new guitarist John 5 on his 2021 album ‚ÄòSinner.‚Äô Cr√ºe‚Äôs last studio album was ‚ÄòSaints Of Los Angeles‚Äô in 2008.
Thank you for asking. Me and
[@how2girl]are really busy between all our business‚Äôs and our daughter. Nice to be off the road til next year.[https://t.co/sUiqNfdCeb]‚Äî üì∑ (@NikkiSixx)
[November 21, 2024]

author: @KXIITV
title: Tips on keeping your AC unit at peak performance
text: Tips on keeping your AC unit at peak performance SHERMAN, Texas (KXII) - The long, hot month of August is approaching, meaning more work for your AC unit. ‚ÄúYour HVAC system is the most expensive appliance in your home and it utilizes the most amount of energy so one thing you want to do is one, it‚Äôs costly to repair, it‚Äôs costly to replace so doing your routine performance maintenance on your HVAC system is crucial, especially with this Texas Heat because it definitely puts it through its paces,‚Äù said Dana Bacon, the general manage of Crazy AC Guy. Crazy AC Guy has been serving Texomans for 16 years, they‚Äôve stayed busy this summer partly due to a lack of consistency in caring for their AC unit. Bacon said you should have your system cleaned by a professional every six months. ‚ÄúWhen you have a dirty condensing coil or a dirty evaporator coil or a dirty filter on your HVAC system, it causes that system to work so much harder and it decreases your capacity, but it also increases your utility [usage, so](http://usage.so) it‚Äôs costing more to operate to be less comfortable.‚Äù Also make sure the condensing unit isn‚Äôt restricted anyway, by dirt or items or it‚Äôll burn more energy, and keep the grass around it cut. ‚ÄúBasically how an air conditioner works, it‚Äôs absorbing the heat inside your home and releasing it outside. And if it‚Äôs restricted, if there‚Äôs an overhang over the top of the unit, it‚Äôs recirculating all that hot air that is discharged, it‚Äôs going to cause your amp draw and your compressor to work harder and it‚Äôs going to run hotter. So it‚Äôs going to burn more energy. And also if the coil is dirty and restricted, that also will cause the same scenario... [You] definitely wanna keep the grass clear around the condensing unit. You also wanna keep any dogs from urinating on the condenser because that will deteriorate the coil and lose efficiency and end up causing it to leak refrigerant,‚Äù said Bacon. Bacon said the best temperature to keep your thermostat on is 76 to 78 degrees when you‚Äôre away from home. If your AC isn‚Äôt working, Bacon said to first check your breakers and filter, then check your thermostat to make sure it‚Äôs set for cooling, and the indoor and outdoor fan to see if it‚Äôs moving air. If you can‚Äôt find the problem at that point, call a professional. Copyright 2024 KXII. All rights reserved.

author: @ciudad_magazine
title: Sorpresiva informaci√≥n sobre el futuro laboral de Marcos Ginoccio, el √∫ltimo campe√≥n de Gran Hermano: "Se est√° preparando para actuar" | Ciudad Magazine
text: [Luego del furor que fue su triunfo](https://www.ciudad.com.ar/espectaculos/2023/11/17/como-fue-el-reencuentro-de-julieta-poggio-con-marcos-ginocchio-tras-su-enojo-por-el-rumor-de-affaire-con-coti/) en Gran Hermano 2023, Marcos Ginocchio mantuvo un bajo perfil respecto a su presencia en los medios. Y fue √Ångel de Brito quien sorprendi√≥ [al revelar c√≥mo encarar√≠a](https://www.ciudad.com.ar/espectaculos/2023/11/06/coti-romero-confirmo-que-se-beso-con-marcos-ginocchio-y-dio-mas-detalles-del-intimo-encuentro/) el √∫ltimo campe√≥n del reality de Telefe su futuro laboral. ‚ÄúPor ah√≠ lo tenemos ac√°, pero lo digo. [Capaz lo tenemos en unos d√≠as](https://www.ciudad.com.ar/espectaculos/2023/11/05/marcos-ginocchio-fue-elegido-por-una-importante-marca-para-cumplir-un-gran-sueno/) en vivo y lo cuenta √©l. Marcos no quiere hacer tele, no quiere hacer Gran Hermano, esto es palabra m√≠a, no quiere estar en ning√∫n panel‚Äù, asegur√≥ el conductor de LAM en vivo. ‚ÄúMarcos no quiere hacer tele, no quiere hacer Gran Hermano, esto es palabra m√≠a, no quiere estar en ning√∫n panel‚Äù. ‚Äú√âl quiere seguir [trabajando como modelo](https://www.ciudad.com.ar/espectaculos/2023/12/21/la-mama-de-marcos-ginocchio-mostro-la-cucha-navidena-de-morita-la-perrita-de-gran-hermano/). Se est√° preparando para actuar, pero no quiere agarrar ninguna cosa hasta que no se sienta preparado‚Äù, agreg√≥, dejando en claro el deseo del joven de 24 a√±os de incursionar en la ficci√≥n. ‚ÄúNo quiere hacer papelones y quiere hacer un trabajo profesional‚Äù, cerr√≥ De Brito, en referencia a Ginoccio, quien en un futuro podr√≠a hablar [√©l mismo de su carrera](https://www.ciudad.com.ar/espectaculos/2023/10/17/el-emotivo-mensaje-que-julieta-poggio-le-dedico-a-marcos-ginocchio-por-su-cumpleanos-puras-palabras-de-amor/) en el programa de Am√©rica. Le√© m√°s FUERTE REACCI√ìN DE UN PARTICIPANTE DE GRAN HERMANO AL ESCUCHAR DEL SUPUESTO ROMANCE DE LA CHINA SU√ÅREZ Y MARCOS GINOCCHIO En una de las tantas charlas que se dio [ entre los participantes](https://www.ciudad.com.ar/espectaculos/2023/11/02/angel-de-brito-mando-al-frente-a-coti-romero-y-revelo-que-estuvo-a-los-besos-con-marcos-ginocchio-besa-bien/) que ingresaron a Gran Hermano 2023, Emmanuel no pas√≥ por alto que [se refirieran al supuesto romance](https://www.ciudad.com.ar/espectaculos/2023/11/27/china-suarez-le-dedico-un-emotivo-mensaje-a-marcos-ginocchio-luego-de-compartir-un-viaje-juntos/) de Eugenia ‚Äúla China‚Äù Su√°rez y Marcos Ginocchio, y fue contundente con su reacci√≥n. ‚Äú¬øQu√© te importa con qui√©n est√° la China Su√°rez? [Hoy te voy a atacar](https://www.ciudad.com.ar/espectaculos/2023/11/24/las-sorpresivas-imagenes-de-china-suarez-y-marcos-ginocchio-juntos-en-mexico-el-motivo-de-su-viaje/). ¬øQu√© importa con qui√©n est√°? Estoy harto de que hablen de con qui√©n con est√°, o con qui√©n no est√°‚Äù, lanz√≥ el joven, sin filtro, frente a todos. ‚Äú¬øNo pueden hablar de lo diosa e ic√≥nica que es? Es una bomba, linda, hermosa. Buena mina, escandalosa tambi√©n‚Äù, cerr√≥, [dejando en claro su postura](https://www.ciudad.com.ar/espectaculos/2023/11/05/marcos-ginocchio-fue-elegido-por-una-importante-marca-para-cumplir-un-gran-sueno/) sobre los comentarios y cr√≠ticas que fueron para la actriz y cantante.
